16.title: Ghostly Rings of Dying Star Captured in Never-Before-Seen Detail by JWST
16.description: NGC 1514 is a planetary nebula about 1500 light-years away.
16.content:
NGC 1514 is a planetary nebula about 1500 light-years away. William Herschel discovered it in 1790, and its discovery made him rethink the nature of nebulae.

16.title: The Lyrid meteor shower is expected to dazzle the night sky beginning this week
16.description: The Lyrid meteor shower will reach a peak later this month, but stargazers can catch a first glimpse beginning Wednesday night.
16.content:
The Lyrid meteor shower, one of the oldest annual meteor showers known to humankind, will once again grace Earth's sky beginning this week.
This year, the meteors are expected to come into view on Wednesday night and last through April 25.

16.title: Astronomers Detect a Signature of Life on a Distant Planet
16.description: Further studies are needed to determine whether K2-18b, which orbits a star 120 light-years away, is inhabited, or even habitable.
16.content:

15.description: An expedition spotted a baby of the species in the South Sandwich Islands. This cephalopod can grow to more than 20 feet and has proved elusive in its deep-sea environs.

15.title: Scientists find evidence that overturns theories of the origin of water on Earth
15.description: University of Oxford researchers have helped overturn the popular theory that water on Earth originated from asteroids bombarding its surface. Instead, the material which built our planet was far richer in hydrogen than previously thought. The findings have been published today in the journal Icarus.
15.content: A team of researchers at the University of Oxford have uncovered crucial evidence for the origin of water on Earth. Using a rare type of meteorite, known as an enstatite chondrite, which has a composition analogous to that of the early Earth (4.55 bi... [3703 chars]

14.title: Satellite Data Show Motion of Burma Earthquakes
